review: Love it! We also have a PS3, Roku, and an Xbox, and the Fire TV Stick is our favorite to stream from. It has the best interface for streaming through Amazon Prime. The only thing I wished it did was have the ability to stream from a media server from a computer, and so we have to use the Xbox/PS3 for that, but otherwise it's perfect.
